revised_title: Gigantic Land-Tortoises of the Galapagos and Mascarenes Islands
tldr: The author examines the remains of gigantic land-tortoises from the Mascarenes and Galapagos Islands, concluding that they were distinct species that became extinct. The Galapagos tortoises are found to have different races, with four species identified based on their physical characteristics. The author also mentions a fifth species, yet to be fully studied.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Evolution and Paleobiology
